articles.author: Julianna LeMieux, PhD
articles.title: Immune Signals Initiated by Chromosomal Instability Lead to Metastasis - Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News
articles.description: Chromosome instability activates a key immune pathway, the STING pathway, that dampens immune responses and helps cancer spread.
articles.content: A new tool, ContactTracing, enabled researchers to show that chronic activation of the STING pathway, induced by chromosomal instability (CIN), promotes downstream changes in cellular signaling. This… [+4444 chars]

articles.author: Pranjal Mehar
articles.title: Scientists uncovered a previously unknown mechanism for protein degradation in cells - Tech Explorist
articles.description: The mechanism degrades short-lived proteins that support brain and immune functions.
articles.content: Short-lived proteins regulate gene expression in cells to carry out various crucial functions. These proteins are created in the nucleus and, after performing their function, are promptly eliminated.… [+4631 chars]

articles.title: Building-sized asteroid racing towards Earth, warns NASA; check speed and close approach - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details of a close encounter with an asteroid that is nearly the size of the Tunguska space rock that caused catastrophic damage in 1908. Know details of the close approach.
